title: NRA Criticizes Open Carry Demonstrators
teaser: The NRA says demonstrators prominently carrying guns and rifles in public places are hurting the open carry cause.
contentencoded:
The National Rifle Association is taking issue with “open carry” groups that have been prominently carrying guns and rifles in public places and stores. The groups are calling for an expansion of open carry rights. The NRA, which also wants an expansion of those rights, says the demonstrations are hurting the cause.
